overview: Haqim's life is at a standstill, having lost his girlfriend to his best pal.  A chance encounter with the sensual Japanese girl Midori, rekindles his faith in love. Their growing passion takes on a sinister twist,  when strange incidents befall those close to him. This forces Haqim to grapple with the truth that Midori's love comes at a deadly price.  Meaning 'soul' in Japanese, KONPAKU challenges the concept of love,  within the confines of one's faith and sexuality.
title: Konpaku
